comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Private Franklin, Company B, Darlington Guards: "Franklin, Eli - enlisted at Newberry, July 27, 1861; on muster roll of December 31, 1864. " www.researchonline.net/sccw/rosters/1stingb.htm

comment.author: 101418643@N07
comment._content: Company B was the Rhett Guards from Newberry, not the Darlington Guards.
